title: Seven  RP short for Officer Caitlin, Riot Please!
body:
Dear Riot,

I was in utmost devastation when Officer Caitlin was on sale this week  for 487 RP. Unfortunately, I have only 480 RP, seven RP short of the price asked. Please Riot, is there anything that you can do to get me 7 RP to buy the skin?

Yours Truly,
WingedWheel19

replies.body: Them rioters always love a good drawing!

I believe if you create a ticket they can help you. Usually you have to draw a picture or something silly like that. That is, as long as you aren't just posting this on the boards because you want someone to gift it to you.
How do I create such a ticket?

umm... like any other ticket I guess?
